behaviour.tooltipDescription: "CasaOS is an open-source, self-hosted home server platform that simplifies managing and accessing files, media, and applications, all from a centralized, user-friendly dashboard."

"Eramba is an open-source governance, risk, and compliance (GRC) platform that helps organizations manage risk assessments, compliance requirements, audits, and policies in one streamlined dashboard."
"Uptime Kuma is a self-hosted monitoring app that tracks your services' uptime and performance, sending real-time alerts for any downtime or issues."
"Jellyfin is a free, self-hosted media server that lets you organize, stream, and enjoy your personal media collection across devices, all without third-party tracking."
"Gitea is a lightweight, self-hosted Git service that provides collaborative version control, issue tracking, and code review, all within an intuitive web interface."
"Crafty is a powerful Minecraft server manager, providing easy server setup, monitoring, and management through an intuitive web-based interface."
"Jellyfin is a free, self-hosted media server that lets you organize, stream, and enjoy your personal media collection across devices, all without third-party tracking."
"Readarr is a self-hosted tool for managing ebooks and audiobooks, automating downloads and organization while integrating with various indexers."
"Crafty is a powerful Minecraft server manager, providing easy server setup, monitoring, and management through an intuitive web-based interface."
"Radarr is a self-hosted movie management tool that automates the downloading, organizing, and tracking of films from various sources."
"Sonarr is a self-hosted TV series management tool that automates the downloading, organizing, and tracking of episodes from various sources."
"Check the status of a server with a simple elegant website."

"qBittorrent is a free, open-source BitTorrent client that offers a lightweight and user-friendly interface, built-in search functionality, and robust features for efficient file sharing and downloading."

"Proxmox is an open-source virtualization platform that enables you to deploy and manage virtual machines and containers easily, providing a powerful and flexible environment for server consolidation and resource management."
"Lidarr is a self-hosted music collection manager that automates the downloading, organizing, and tracking of albums from various sources."
"Uptime Kuma is a self-hosted monitoring app that tracks your services' uptime and performance, sending real-time alerts for any downtime or issues."

"Eramba is an open-source governance, risk, and compliance (GRC) platform that helps organizations manage risk assessments, compliance requirements, audits, and policies in one streamlined dashboard."
"Jellyseerr is a self-hosted request management and media discovery tool for Jellyfin, enabling users to browse, request, and manage content seamlessly."
"Portainer is a lightweight management UI for Docker, allowing you to easily manage containers, images, and volumes through a simple and intuitive interface."
"Nextcloud is a self-hosted cloud platform that offers secure file storage, sharing, and collaboration, along with tools for productivity, all accessible from any device."
"Prowlarr is a powerful, self-hosted indexer manager for managing your torrent and Usenet indexers, allowing for streamlined content discovery and automation for your media server."
"CasaOS is an open-source, self-hosted home server platform that simplifies managing and accessing files, media, and applications, all from a centralized, user-friendly dashboard."
"Gitea is a lightweight, self-hosted Git service that provides collaborative version control, issue tracking, and code review, all within an intuitive web interface."
